start.bot: Would you like to see an overview for each phone, or answer a few questions so I can help you identify possible candidates?

ideal_budget_not_sure.bot: What kind of phone do you have in mind? An affordable and basic basic option for calling and texting, a standard everyday phone, or a premium device offering the best technology available?

options.text: Not sure.. contact a human expert

contact_customer_service.bot: Getting in touch with customer service…

budget_questions.bot: Do you find yourself in need of a phone with a stronger and faster performance, or a reliable but less powerful option?

average_questions.bot: Do you prioritize higher battery life, stronger performance, or a mix of both?

average_questions_helper.bot: Would you like to see all 3 options, or be directed to a human expert?

premium_questions.bot: Do you prefer premium features, or high-performance hardware?

premium_questions_helper.bot: Premium multimedia features include the clearest displays on the market, advanced image processing with multi-lens camera systems, and high-fidelity stereo speakers. High-performance hardware options include fast processors and ample internal storage? Which side do you think you lean towards more?

options.text: Still not sure.. contact an expert!

premium_features.bot: Would you prefer a high-quality display for better visuals, or a top-notch camera for capturing great photos and videos?

premium_hardware.bot: Would you prefer the top of the line specs, built for gaming and demanding tasks, or a less powerful but more battery efficient daily use alternative?

question_budget.bot: Would you like to see other phones in the affordable price range?

question_average.bot: Would you like to see other competitors in a similar price range?

question_premium_or_customer_service.bot: Would you like to see all 4 premium options, or be directed to a human expert who may be able to assist you with more detailed questions?

question_premium.bot: Would you like to see all competitors in the premium price range?

end_conversation.bot: It was wonderful talking with you, and I hope I was able to help!

post_end_conversation.bot: Before we wrap up, would you like to go through the questions again to explore other options? If not, I’d really appreciate it if you took a quick survey—the feedback helps me get better at assisting more customers!
